ebola madalimata shri lankawen shalyakarma athwasum miliyanayak*** shri lankawe hastha karmanthaya gana wisthara athulath sithiyama janapathita*** dakshina adhiwegaye kotasak ada paya dekak wase*** shishyathwa wibhagaye pa්rathipala me masa agadi*** janathawage dukata kimbaul kandulu helana wipakshaya balaye thibune nam janathawata yana kala dasawak naha - amathi filiks*** pakisthanaya wenuwen oththu balu shri lankika sakakaru dina 06k randawa ganimin prashna karayi*** wyaja wisa magin malesiyawata yamata siti 08k allayi - wisa sakas kala dedenath dale*** indiya bharathiya janatha pakshaye nayakayin depalak shri lankawata*** 20wanada uuwe surasal wase*** anawasara banar saha katawut iwath kirimata wishesha meheyumak***

tenisan yanu sarasawiya sagayan mada nithara mathrukawak wana hithawatheki.eheth me dina wala tenisan edirisinha gana me rata thota mathrukawak wa aththe ohu mul warata siya chayarupa ekathuwak pawathwana bawini.wasara pahalowakata aasanna kalayak sarasawiya chayarupa shilpiya lesa tenisan ge asata hasuwu kalakaruwan rasaki.eya sankhyawen thun siyaya ikmawa siti.chayarupa washayen gath kala nam eya lakshaya ikmawanu atha.mewara chayarupa ekathuwata thora ganenuye eyin athalossaki.me chayarupa ekathuwata dama athi nama sihina seya ya.teni ge sihinaya saba karalannata me dina wala sarasawiya aththan da hawul wa aththe eya gedara wadak bawini.tenisan yayi kiwwata ape tenisange niyama nama tenisan ma nowe.
